summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Best Hair Straightener and Curls Flat Iron 1 Inch Ceramic Hair Straightener #XX019
Review Date: 2015/12/10
Store: SNEER
Average Rating: 5.0
Product Details: {}
Review Text: Excellant
Review Title: Beautiful
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Ebingoo Long Straight Grey Ombre Dark Roots Synthetic Lace Front Wig 28 inch
Review Date: 2016/01/09
Average Rating: 3.0
Product Details: {'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '10.5 x 6.1 x 1.6 inches; 14.4 Ounces', 'UPC': '711420422821'}
Review Text: Amazing! one word of advice though.. synthetic wigs are fibers do not have  mbrush ones like this with a "far back" or "deep" lace front (and that part is all hand tied btw) ,and then the rest of the wig is machine made,... or you will be inone big mess lol find the widest tooth comb u can and use that starting from the ends at the very bottom going towards top of head section by section slowwwwwly or "Luxor's wet brush" brushing same way Amazon definitely sells it think for about $8 or $10 but  not only is this brush  amazing for your hair but it's awesomeeeee for synthetic wigs as well as humans course. as you can see I am a licensed cosmetologist for over 12 years and I have never seen a brush transforn all of my clients hair into such healthier hair once you get this bro she will never go back ik back to the wig I never write reviews btw but thought I'd offer some advice bc I own over50 wigs!! Lol it's z healthy way to change ur hair color! Anyway Google what are the different material they use to make synthetic wigs and see which look is best for you!  As far as care goes get the comb or that brush along with baby oil, baby powder (or dry shampoo) ..a sulfate free shampoo n conditioner and this is so good for ur hair as well (Loreal has good ones that you can get anywhere) larger sized zip lock bags (not brand) (everything iin this review can be "equate brand" or any generic) clips, and finally an old empty spray bottle if U have one that use to be a product wash it good and refil it with bittled water or filtered  or just buy one in the "travel size items isle" and full that up...Ok so if the ends of your long shiny beautiful wig like this one gets frayed looking or frizzy you are aloud to use heat on this particular wig ( it usually always says it in the info somewhere) so what u wanna do is either wash n condition it first only if It's been a very long time..,.. do not wash synthetic wigs often! I repeat (ok u get it) ok so when u wash a wig ur suppose to fill sink up w a squeeze of shampoo n wTer let sit for 15 rinse. Cool water blot w towel then repeat  steps with the conditioner  and rinse w cool cold water. Ok then blow dry on warm or let sit over night n air dry then once wig is dry get you clips and spray bottle (or if u didn't have to was it you would start here) Clip the top sections up leaving all the hair right above ur ears and below down spray about 3-4 times w water set flat iron to 150-200 no higher! N take a your wet brush or comb n comb the damp hair n flat iron it while damp ull see steam that's ok ;) repeat steps until hair feels how it did when first purchased :) one your done get your baby oil n run a little like the size of a dime rub it on your hands as if it was lotion then take your hands and rub it through wig comb or brush it nicely n gently from ends to top n every evening before bed store it in a plastic bag try n get all air out of bag while sealing it! If u at least do the oil n bag every night for storage this will keep ur synthetic wig nice n it will last you way longer then if not. The bottoms of synthetic wigs tend to get ratty and poofy fizzy like looking so always be extra generous with moisture as wigs are not hair growing from your head getting all those natural oils.. And the flat iron n water trick is the best for that like I said..but anyway as your doing this an old lamp (not plugged in)!lmao or a huge candle will work as a manequin head or simply type in "styrofoam manequin head for wig "on here or go to ur local beauty supply and they should have one if you ask! They're like 3-$4 the baby powder or dry shampoo is for top to middie only(not in the bottom or ends) if wig is toooooi shiny looking! Ok I'm done holy crap no wonder y I don't write reviews lol ...but yes this wig is gorgeous Lolll hope I helped someone out there
Review Title: Helpful tricks!! Great wig
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------

=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: LVMIX Mink Lashes Pack 3D & 4D Volume Mink False Lashes 100% Siberian Cruelty-free with EyeLash Tweezer
Review Date: 2019/04/14
Store: Yiwamica
Average Rating: 4.2
Product Details: {'Brand': 'Yiwamica', 'Material': 'Mink Fur', 'Material Feature': 'Cruelty Free', 'Item Form': 'Individual', 'Mounting Type': 'Eyelash Glue', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '4.2 x 1.6 x 0.7 inches; 3.21 Ounces', 'UPC': '682559263237'}
Review Text: You guys these lashes are amazing if you like dramatic lashes! In the picture I’m wearing the natural pair of the 2 sets! Each pair u can wear up to 30 times! You don’t need mascara on these but u definitely want to put mascara on ur lashes so they have something to grip on to! After u wear them about 3 times then the glue is built up enough so it’s easy to be removed with tweezers!
Review Title: Amazing!!!
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: ABH AmazingBeauty Hair Clip Ins - AmazingBeauty Luxury Blonde Remy Human Hair Double Weft Clip in Hair Extensions, Full Head 140 Gram, 7 Pieces with 18 Clips, Platinum Blonde 60, 20 Inch
Review Date: 2019/04/17
Store: ABH AMAZINGBEAUTY HAIR
Average Rating: 4.1
Product Details: {'Brand': 'ABH AMAZINGBEAUTY HAIR', 'Material': 'Human Hair', 'Extension Length': '20 Inches', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Installation Type': 'Clip-In', 'Package Dimensions': '10.2 x 4 x 3 inches; 10.41 Ounces', 'UPC': '639846527848'}
Review Text: [[VIDEOID:1678964622d13f5c794c94cf5ebdd0d8]] So I am a hairstylist and I have been for 13 years. I am super picky about hair and the quality. I was a little bit nervous ordering off Amazon but I read the other reviews and I figured why not. When I got the hair I could not believe the incredible quality of it. It’s super silky and THICK! Another bonus is that the clips are actually comfortable, which I have found is very hard to find. I will definitely order again from this company, as I’m extremely satisfied! Thank you so much ABH hair!
Review Title: AMAZING HAIR!!!
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------

raw_response:
SUMMARY:  
The analyzed purchase history reveals a strong preference for hair care and beauty products, with a focus on hair styling and maintenance. Consistently high ratings (often 5.0) indicate satisfaction with quality, particularly in hair straightening and styling tools, suggesting a preference for effective and reliable products. While there are mixed reviews for synthetic wigs, with notable exceptions, the reviewer demonstrates a deep understanding of hair care, implying a preference for well-informed, high-quality items. 

Themes of versatility in hair products, such as clip-in extensions and synthetic wigs, highlight a desire for temporary and adjustable styles. The consumer appears drawn to natural and organic ingredients, as seen in the positive response to an organic soap, showing elevated sensitivity to product compositions. Despite lower ratings for specific wigs, overall satisfaction stems from a professional hairstylist's insights, indicating a preference for products that align with expert advice.

Price sensitivity trends are not overtly evident, but the emphasis on quality across various products suggests a willingness to pay for high performance and durability. Core preferences can be summarized as an inclination toward premium hair care solutions, with a priority on quality, effectiveness, and versatility in styling options, paired with a conscious choice for natural ingredients when applicable.

target_interaction.title: Amazing and so easy to apply!
target_interaction.text: Amazing!! I love how natural these are yet noticeable. The magnetic eye liner is amazing and makes application soooo much easier!! Very happy with my purchase and will continue to buy from this seller! Thank u.
